name:
Winter Sports 2012 -
Feel the Spirit
description:
HIGHEST. FASTEST. FURTHEST. FIRST.

Immerse yourself in the intense competitive atmosphere in 3D and fight for your country in 7 enthralling winter sport disciplines!

Discover the ultimate in winter sports fun and experience breathtaking contests for up to 4 players: Ski Cross, Ice Speedway, Ski Jumping, Alpine Downhill, Alpine Slalom Skiing, Curling and Short Track Speed Skating!
